pages.text: An imperfect ritual that grants the blessing of Neptune, allowing the user to breathe underwater and swim with the grace of dolphins.$(br2)$(bold)Setup:$()$(br)Place a Prismarine Block on top of an Imperfect Ritual Stone.$(br2)$(bold)Cost:$() 2000 LP per use$(br2)$(bold)Duration:$() 15 minutes$(br2)$(bold)Note:$() The ritual activates once and completes immediately. The stone can be reused.

pages.title: Effects
pages.text: $(bold)Activation:$()$(br)Right-click the Imperfect Ritual Stone to receive:$(li)$(thing)Water Breathing$() for 15 minutes$(li)$(thing)Dolphin's Grace$() for 15 minutes$(li)Both effects have no visible particles$(br2)$(bold)Use Cases:$()$(li)Extended underwater exploration$(li)Ocean monument raiding$(li)Underwater building projects$(li)Searching for shipwrecks$(br2)$(italic)The sea welcomes you.$()
